d:
Lyn signed out of curiosity to participate in a new test system for streamers. She liked the idea that you can just improve your appearance and buy whatever you want just because you're being watched.

This is an unusual comic format for me, but I hope that you will like this comic :)

I will be sincerely glad if you can support me on Patreon, there you will get new chapters a month or two earlier before I publish them publicly, and you will also get many other bonuses. Thanks to everyone who already supports me, this is extremely motivating to work further and create better comics. https://www.patreon.com/SirNrei
